resources.string:
Recording conversations without consent is illegal in many states. Ask for consent before using this app.\ 
This app records conversations and calculates how much each person spoke. It is under construction. It does not perform well on long conversations, due to the complex computation required, nor on noisy ambients.
 
Press Record to start the , and to reset the tally, press "RESET".
 
When the meeting is over, press "FINISH" to see the final tally.
Great! Before we go on, please click this menu to see more options
click outside menu area to close.
Hi! click here and start talking, it would be better if
Now click here, when you are done talking
Whoops didn\'t like your recording? Click here to reset!
Record your conversation one more time!
Just a heads up, you can stop the recording and continue recording. So click play button to record more :)
Phew that was exausting but we are done! Hit finish to continue.

This app is a prototype effort by students working with Dr. Ting Xiao in the Loyola University Chicago Computer Science department. It primarily relies on the LIUM package to diarize the audio signal. 

Initial development was performed by Marcos Leal and Edgard Oliveira with later improvements by Albert Du and final development and deployment by Rejoice Jebamalaidass. 

 This app is based on and uses many open source library. Main open source libraries used by this app are LIUM / Sphinx for Diarization and HoloGraphic for the Graphs.
